channel.title: Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4056
channel.description:
Hi when i walk east of ardougne (towards legends guild i get this error)
I am not a great client coder so not entirely sure what it means or how i would fix it, Any ideas would be lovely.
[code] Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4056 at EntityDef.method161(EntityDef.java:109) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:9879) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8252) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9194) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:176) at client.run(client.java:4807) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4056
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

I found the problem, The NPC Wizard Cromperty was causing a bug when loading. On my server the NPC ID was 844 although for others it could be different.

I thought i’d post solution here for others

Read full topic

item.title: Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4056
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:1, topic:540299”]Hi when i walk east of ardougne (towards legends guild i get this error)

I am not a great client coder so not entirely sure what it means or how i would fix it, Any ideas would be lovely.

Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4056 at EntityDef.method161(EntityDef.java:109) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:9879) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8252) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9194) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:176) at client.run(client.java:4807) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/quote]I think the map-data for that region isn’t in your client, so in the map data array it looks for index 4056 which doesn’t exist.

Read full topic
